title: Align and Balance Chiropractic: Chiropractor in Concord, CA
description: Visit our skilled Chiropractor in Concord, CA. Accepting new appointments. Call today at 925-375-1903 or request an appointment online.
sitename: Align and Balance Chiropractic - Chiropractor in Concord, CA
cleaned_text: Our Services Knee Pain Knee pain is increasingly becoming a more common problem in society. It is a complaint we see frequently. The most common complaint associated with knee pain is considered the normal "wear and tear." Another ailment that affects the knee is osteoarthritis. Custom Orthotics Custom orthotics are specially designed shoe inserts that are tailored to an individual's unique foot shape and intended to alleviate pain, provide support, and improve overall foot function.
